full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Request for Proposal for Two (2) Glove Boxes

The Department of Health Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of two (2) glove boxes.

#### Background Information

The Department of Health Canada requires two (2) glove boxes to support its laboratory and testing requirements. Interested suppliers must meet the mandatory evaluation criteria outlined in Annex A, Part 2.1 – Requirement of the Request for Proposal.

#### Contract Requirements

*   Supply of two (2) glove boxes
*   Installation and training services
*   Delivery to Ottawa, ON within six (6) months after contract award
*   Period of the contract: from the date of award to one year after the date of acceptance inclusive
*   Optional additional services: up to three (3) additional one (1) year periods to exercise the optional services detailed in the Statement of Requirement

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria for this RFP are outlined in Annex A, Part 2.1 – Requirement of the Request for Proposal.

#### Submission and Contact Information

*   Submission deadline: *June 24, 2024, 2:00 PM ET*
*   Notice publication date: *May 23, 2024*
*   Attachment: None
*   Contact information for the Contracting Authority:
    -   Name: Grace Chau
    -   Email: [grace.chau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:grace.chau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
    -   Phone: Not available at this time

#### PTAC Registration Requirements

A Permits, Licenses and Certificates of Incorporation (PLCI) is mandatory for this contract.

#### How to Submit Your Bid

To submit your bid, log on to the Ariba Portal (discovery.ariba.com) and click on Request for Proposal. Please refer to the supplier instructions available on the Ariba Portal for details on the submission instructions. For more information, please consult Permit, Licence and Certificate of Incorporation (PLCI)](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Language of Communication

The language of communication for this contract is English and French. The crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on the procurement.

#### Address

The contracting authority is located at 11 Laurier St West, Place du Portage, Phase III, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada.
